device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
contribution_desc: A augmented reality (AR), multi-player Capture-The-Flag game, where a tablet in the center of the table shows a world view. Through handheld smartphones, the players view 3D objects on top of the 2D world view. Players can place traps through their handheld device and steal each others flags by interacting with the shared tablet.
tracking_characteristic: Inside-out tracking; Location 3D; Tracking devices only
device_models: XPS 18 Windows Multi-touch Tablet; Android smartphones
